self_emotion: feeling delight because you received an unexpected tax refund in the mail.

utterance: Let's now shift our discussion to the travel dates. Considering our budget, which period will be cost-effective for our trip to Italy?

utterance: Great news everyone, my surprising tax refund may help us! As for trip dates, travelling off-season, around November to March, will be most budget-friendly.

utterance: Fantastic, Andrew! The off-peak period, November to March, is indeed cheaper. Let's aim for early March to avoid Christmas and New Year prices and enjoy slightly warmer weather.
